metadata.title: CVE-2021-42260 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
TinyXML through 2.6.2 has an infinite loop in TiXmlParsingData::Stamp intinyxmlparser.cpp via the TIXML_UTF_LEAD_0 case. It can be triggered by acrafted XML message and leads to a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-42260` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtinyxml2.6.2v5 - 2.6.2-4+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tinyxml package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.2-4+deb10u1build0.20.04.1').
